msg: DTDs are now packed into the directory /openejb/dtds in the openejb-x.x.jar

author: dblevins
msg: Added DTDResolver based on some code that Aaron Mulder contributed in the modern
assembler.  The new DTDResolver load the dtd data from the openejb-x.x.jar
using the jar resource functionality added by Alan Cabrera.
